about.title: About Tlemcen Smart Supermarket
about.subtitle: A blend of tradition and technology in the heart of Tlemcen.
about.p1: At Tlemcen Smart Supermarket, we merge the warmth and variety of a traditional local market with the convenience of modern technology. Our mission is to bring you a unique shopping experience, offering the finest local and imported goods right to your doorstep.
about.p2: From farm-fresh fruits and vegetables to quality meats, dairy, and daily baked goods, we carefully select each item to ensure the highest quality and freshness. We support local farmers and producers, boosting our community's economy while providing the best for our customers.
about.p3: With our user-friendly platform and innovative features, grocery shopping has never been easier or more enjoyable. Join us on this journey as we redefine the shopping experience in Tlemcen.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Send us a message or visit us.

form.subject: Subject
form.success_desc: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.

legal.p1_text: Welcome to Tlemcen Smart Supermarket. This Privacy Policy governs your use of our website and services. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
legal.p2_text: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you. Types of Data collected may include:
legal.p2_l2: Usage Data (information on how the Service is accessed and used)
legal.p3_text: Tlemcen Smart Supermarket uses the collected data for various purposes: to provide and maintain the Service, to notify you about changes to our Service, and to provide customer support and provide analysis so that we can improve the Service.
legal.p4_text: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
legal.p5_text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
legal.contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
legal.t1_text: By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the Service.
legal.t2_text: When you create an account with us, you must provide us information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service.
legal.t3_text: The Service and its original content, features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Tlemcen Smart Supermarket and its licensors.
legal.t4_text: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
legal.t5_text: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Algeria, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
